kashyapa budurajanan wahanse ge shashanaya pirihi yana kalayedi ee bawa dutu bhikshun wahansela sath namak imahath sanwegayata pamina, “budusasna pawathna me uthum awasthawa ikma giyahoth nawatha apata sasara dukin midimata pihitak karagatha haki kalayak kawada labe da yi no kiya haki bawin jiwitha parithyagayen wuwa da uthsaha kota apa wisin dukin midimata pihitak kara gatha yuthuya” yi salaka, kashyapa budurajanan wahanse ge dhathu nidan kala swarna chaithyaya wanda, maha wanayata wada, nagiya no hena ek parwathayak daka, jiwithashawa aththo nawathithwa!

jandaye palaweni watedi madhyama wamanshika paksha hawulen nagaradhipathi thanathurata tharaga karapu tharuna apekshakaya dinanawa,mita issalla bale thibunu pakshaya 3 thanata wisi wenawa,ape bayisikal apekshaka thuma 2 thanata enawa,,,awurudu 60 withara unata thanikara tharunayek wage hasirima wada,kida,dan eelaga watayata sudanam wenawa,,,me wate 1 saha 2 sthana gaththu apekshakayo 2 athara witharayi jandaya,munata munala karana rupawahini wiwadayedi ape bayisikal mahaththaya sahena idiriyata enawa,,deweni wate jandayen bayisikal mahaththaya dinanawa,aluth nagaradhipathige kiyanna karana godak thiyanawa,,meyage thibunu saralakama thama jandaya dinanna godak balapawe,sarala minihek wenna mulikawa balapala thiyenne tibetwalata gihin budu dahama hadarima,meyage loke wirayo thama matin luthar kin,dalayi lama,pransis papthuma,me minissunge thiyana saralakama eyage jiwitheta loku wenasak kalalu,ee atharin budu dahama eyata sahena balapamak kalalu,ee saralakama dakapu me minissu meyawa wishwasa kala,thamange kada watunu nagare meya goda gani kiyana eka ada serama wishwasa karanawa,,nagare diyunuwa apitath godak durata balapawi.mama me kalpana kale budu dahama thiyana ape rate deshapalakayanta me wage saralakama purudu wenna bari ayi kiyana eka,balan yanakota me minissu aluthen budu dahama igena gena eekath thamange rate diyunuwata harawanna aragena,ada kohomath mehe deshapalaneta saralakama loku aayudhayak wela,,minissu piliganne ee saralakama.

gunathmaka bawin yuthu kabanika palathuru sadaha athi ihala illuma nisa obage aswanu ihala milakata alawi kala hakiya.*palathuru wagawa sadaha wana panshu parikshanaya *krushikarma departhamenthuwa magin nirdeshitha usas thathwaye pala .*wagawata awashya wana siyaluma krushi upadeshana sewawan *obata wagawata awashya pala shethrayatama sapaya dima *pala sadaha gannoruwa krushikarma departhamenthuwa/ grin agro fam magin wagakimak daranu labe.*obage aswanna apa wisinma miladi ganu labe.*siyaluma krushi upadeshana, krushikarmika mewalam ha anekuth sewawan siyalla krushikarmika aayathanaye nirdeshaya matha sidukere.krushi wagawa sadaha yomuwimata adahas karana oba wadidura thorathuru sadaha durakathana margayen apa samaga sambandawanna

pa.wa.sahodaraya liyapu de kese wuwath aththak naththema na, mama oyage lipiyayi, oya oya kiyalathiyena ”parayage” lipiyayi dekama kiyewwa, kohoma unath, mata hangena widiyata natta pagagena thiyenne, ”paraya” nemeyi oya sahodarayayi, metharam kenthiyen(moda parayo meka therun ganin umbae boru potta) kagahanna tharam deyak ee lipi dekema liyala na, ekanisa yam kenekuge waradak penwanakota mitawada tharamk adarshamath wenna puluwannam oya sahodarayage uthsahaya mitawada sarthaka wewi mata hangena widiyata, mokada eyage waradak penwanna giyama oya eeta wada lokuwaradak karanawanam eeken oya uthasaha darana aramuna ituwenne na.

me ayata rajya wishwawidyala paddhathiya raka ganima sandaha wana thama aragalayedi muhuna dimata siduwi thibenne ada rajya balaya athpath karagena sitina 56 parapure daruwange bahuthara samaja kandayamata yi. ’56 parapure du daruwan saha burshuwa prajathanthrawadaya eksath lankeya jathiyak ho prajathanthrawadi samajayak athi kara ganimata apa apohosathwima pasubimehi aththe brithanyayan apata labadun burshuwa, parlimenthu, niyojitha, bahutharaye prajathanthrawadaya saha ‘56 di bandaranayaka muda hala, pashchath wijitha samaye merata samajaye adhipathibhawayata krama kramayen pathwana swadeshiya samaja balawega ekinekata abhimukha wime lakshyayi.
apata wishwa balanna yanna puluwan kiyatada ?

anika kawuruth meka athulata enneth naha.
mama aththatama pinanna igena gaththe muhude.
